notes:
[Threads of Fate](item_cb61612b-9d83-49a9-989d-013bf084fbcb) is easily one of Mercy's top powers, as the utility it offers in terms of damage output and healing output is increased immensely. If you're not taking this power, you're likely starting off wrong.

As it's Round 1, item selection is rather negligible. Take [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) and [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) for a slight boost to your healing output, and [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da) for a solid survivability tool. The extra shields and regeneration time can help keep you up longer in battle.

Keep in mind that you are __NOT__ a pocket support. Your primary goal is to keep your team up. Play Mercy like you would normally, positioning behind cover. When your team is not taking mass amount of damage, push damage boost by swapping beam between your two DPS or Tank/Other Support if they are using strong, key abilities. Lock your beam onto whoever needs healing as necessary. Avoid risky resurrections unless you are __CONFIDENT__ you can pull them off.

Try not to save Valkyrie, it is a less than game-changing ultimate in the early rounds, and saving it doesn't fit well with the fast pace of Stadium.

round_upgrades.notes: Easily the best Power you can take for Round 1 and compliments this build extremely well. Increases the overall efficiency of your healing/damage output by 50%.

notes:
Looking at Round 2, you need to deduce how you performed the previous round. If you were among the last to die in your team during team fights (or didn't die at all), go for [Chain Evoker](item_812cc89e-feb0-47d0-9e03-9d8e33a80aca) to boost the utility of your damage boost and the reward you get from doing so.

If you feel your survivability is not good enough, as you are dying frequently or falling victim to dive characters like D.Va, Genji, or Lucio, then go for [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931), which is easily Mercy's best survivability item.

Hold onto your common Weapon items from Round 1, and invest into any other common survability items if you have the cash to spare.

Continue to play as you were in Round 1.

round_upgrades.notes: Easily the best Power you can take for Round 1 and compliments this build extremely well. Increases the overall efficiency of your healing/damage output by 50%.
If you have the cash to spare, take this for a cheap method of extra survivability.
Take if you feel you are able to survive well.
If you find yourself struggling to stay alive or falling victim to dive characters like D.Va, Genji, or Lucio, take this instead of Chain Evoker.
If you have the cash to spare, take this for a cheap method of extra survivability.

notes:
As we enter Round 3, many other heroes will receive their first major power spike. It is advised against taking [Crepuscular Circle](item_c0b93ed2-b692-44d5-a38a-ce5a63e83cdb) __THIS EARLY__, as [Triage Unit](item_fec0554c-2685-4b93-822d-bf0020e654b4) provides more value in combatting these power spikes.

Try to make sure you are proccing Triage Unit effectively. The healing increase from it can be the difference between your teammates living or not.

Dump all your remaining cash onto blue / green items that boost Weapon Power and Attack Speed. Recommended items are included in the build / listed as optional items.

For this build, it is not recommended to take [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) or [Mid-Air Mobilizer](item_760c1441-8cfa-426c-885d-8d0dec32e145).

round_upgrades.notes: Easily the best Power you can take for Round 1 and compliments this build extremely well. Increases the overall efficiency of your healing/damage output by 50%.

If your co-healer is focusing more on damage and your poor tank is on the floor more often than not, take Triage Unit. Prepare to become a left-click Andy.

It is highly recommended you take this over Battle Medic.

If your team’s damage sucks,  you’re not getting anywhere with blue beaming, and you have decent aim - take Battle Medic. Glock ‘em down.

It is less recommended you take this over Triage Unit.
If you find yourself struggling to stay alive or falling victim to dive characters like D.Va, Genji, or Lucio, take this instead of Chain Evoker.
Unlikely you will have enough for this, but if you do, purchase this before the greens.
Purchase if you have the cash.
Keep if you feel you are able to survive well.

notes:
By Round 4, you should continue to stack up a balance of Weapon Power and Attack Speed.

Personally, I recommend investing into [Amari's Antidote](item_67e0b1c5-3bcb-4ab5-b818-5082e5706124) as it pairs up very well with [Triage Unit](item_fec0554c-2685-4b93-822d-bf0020e654b4) for even more burst healing on targets under 50% HP. From my personal experience, this pairing can come in clutch when it comes to healing.

Dump all your remaining cash onto blue / green items that boost Weapon Power and Attack Speed. Recommended items are included in the build / listed as optional items.

For this build, it is not recommended to take [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) or [Mid-Air Mobilizer](item_760c1441-8cfa-426c-885d-8d0dec32e145).

It is highly recommended you take this over Battle Medic.

notes:
With [Crepuscular Circle](item_c0b93ed2-b692-44d5-a38a-ce5a63e83cdb) now in your artillery, you will be able to make your mediocre ultimate become so much more useful. Ideally, you should be able to have this up every other team fight (or two, maybe), as Mercy builds ultimate incredibly fast in this mode.

Your attack speed from [Booster Jets](item_a291de85-b6d9-43cf-b5da-f3184a156f48) will come in handy here, as you will have no other choice but to DPS during your ultimate. Mercy can quickly unload a barrage of bullets into the enemy team, which can help secure eliminations. __Do not__ get overzealous and extend too far, as a Cassidy or Soldier 76 can shut down Mercy very quickly. Also keep an eye out for low health teammates, and proc [Triage Unit](item_fec0554c-2685-4b93-822d-bf0020e654b4) as necessary.

Dump all your remaining cash onto blue / green items that boost Weapon Power and Attack Speed. Recommended items are included in the build / listed as optional items.

For this build, it is not recommended to take [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) or [Mid-Air Mobilizer](item_760c1441-8cfa-426c-885d-8d0dec32e145).

notes:
Continue building Weapon Power and Attack Speed as you have been the rounds before. It is recommended to take [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) as it provides a good chunk of Weapon Power, despite the pricey cost. If you cannot afford it, purchase the same blue/green alternatives you have been.

If possible, go ahead and invest in whatever you __DON'T__ own between [Chain Evoker](item_812cc89e-feb0-47d0-9e03-9d8e33a80aca) and [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931). Both are very viable items that are recommended to have by this point.

Dump all your remaining cash onto blue / green items that boost Weapon Power and Attack Speed. Recommended items are included in the build / listed as optional items.

notes:
For the last round, push for [Battle Medic](item_ccd0edff-4d57-4ac2-83a7-bab6ff0ffb2f) if you didn't take it back in Round 3, as it has its full effectiveness here. The Weapon Power and Attack Speed you have already, plus the bonus from the power itself essentially allows Mercy to machine gun down the enemy team during her ultimate.

If you'd rather fully invest in healing, then take [Glass Extra Full](item_659ff350-8602-42cd-b5f9-f4da7e5e912b) for the added overhealth that can be procced by either [Threads of Fate](item_cb61612b-9d83-49a9-989d-013bf084fbcb) or Valkyrie.

Aim to invest in [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce) if you have the cash for it, and whichever you __DIDN'T__ take between [Chain Evoker](item_812cc89e-feb0-47d0-9e03-9d8e33a80aca) and [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) if you don't already have them both.

If you do not have enough cash, invest in the same blue/green recommended options that you have been throughout the run so far over the options above.
